translations: （尤指冰球）用假动作诱骗对手

sentences.sentence: Deke did a good job to hit tmac back to his old form.
sentences.translation: 穆大叔做的很好，一肘子把麦迪打醒啦。

sentences.sentence: Tomorrow is my birthday, deke can give me some surprise?
sentences.translation: 明天是我的生日，大叔可以给我点惊喜吗？

sentences.sentence: Deke Thornton: Why not? I sent them back. Thats all I promised to do.
sentences.translation: 为什么没有，我把他们送回来了，这是我曾经承诺的。
